aigisMod:PosterInvitation.NAME: Poster Girl's Invitation
aigisMod:PosterInvitation.FLAVOR: Junon: My shop's pretty popular, y'know!.
DESCRIPTIONS: Add #b1 Junon upgraded to your deck. Receive an extra #ycard #yreward on normal and elite combats, but only includes common cards.

aigisMod:HappyWishes.NAME: Smile of Happy Wishes
aigisMod:HappyWishes.FLAVOR: Rozette: I wield this sword because of my dead kingdom
DESCRIPTIONS: Upgrade #b1 #yRozette in your Deck or add #b1 #yRozette upgraded to your deck. When you add a common card to your deck, #yupgrade it.

aigisMod:Ate.NAME: Ate
aigisMod:Ate.FLAVOR: Kibahime: Offending an oni is really scary, okay?
DESCRIPTIONS: When you draw a card with an original cost of #b4 gain [E]

aigisMod:DarkGuild.NAME: Dark Guild's Servant
aigisMod:DarkGuild.FLAVOR: Irene: From personal care to assassinations and intelligence gathering, please entrust me with any task.
DESCRIPTIONS: When #yAssassination is triggered, draw #b1 card and gain #y8 Gold (Gold gain is once per combat).

aigisMod:MagicAcceleration.NAME: Magic Acceleration
aigisMod:MagicAcceleration.FLAVOR: Towa: Allow me to show you the power as the Lord of Time.
DESCRIPTIONS: #ySluggish will not remove #ySlow.
When you play a #yWitch, draw a card.

aigisMod:WhiteWitch.NAME: White Witch's Wisdom
aigisMod:WhiteWitch.FLAVOR: Belinda: Mother is a busybody. I can do it myself, but...
DESCRIPTIONS: Enemies start with #b1 #ySluggish (temporal #ySlow).
If you use #b2 #yWitch cards in a single turn, deal #b3 damage to all enemies.

aigisMod:HealingTreasure.NAME: Treasure of Healing
aigisMod:HealingTreasure.FLAVOR: Liana: I don't want to just heal wounds, but hearts as well.
DESCRIPTIONS: When you recover #gHP, exhaust #b1 random #yStatus Card from #yhand, #ydiscard or #ydraw #ypile.

aigisMod:DarknessAura.NAME: Suppressing Darkness Aura
aigisMod:DarknessAura.FLAVOR: Dark Knight: I already gave up mine own life. Use me as naught more than a sacrificial pawn.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, add #b1 #yDark #yKnight (card) to hand.
If you played no #bAttack cards in a turn apply #b1 #yWeak to all enemies and gain #b8 #yblock.

aigisMod:AegisTreasure.NAME: Sacred Treasure's Successor
aigisMod:AegisTreasure.FLAVOR: Anna: The sacred treasures that are the arms of Aigis were originally used by the gods.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b1 #yDexterity at the start of each combat. Add #b1 Sacred Treasure of Aigis to your Deck.
When you play an #ySkill gain #b1 #ycounter.

aigisMod:GodSlaying.NAME: Title:God Slaying Hero
aigisMod:GodSlaying.FLAVOR: Let me give you, who is the hero that prevailed over Keraunos, the sacred treasure of the goddess
DESCRIPTIONS: Add #b1 Sacred Treasure of Keraunos to your Deck.
At the end of your turn, if you have no [E] deal #b5 damage to all enemies.

aigisMod:HeroKing.NAME: Hero King's Successor
aigisMod:HeroKing.FLAVOR: Sybilla: Everyone is waiting for the Prince's words. The words of the new Hero King.
DESCRIPTIONS: Add #b1 Sword of Salvation to your Deck.
At the end of your turn, if you have no cards in hand, gain #b1 #yStrength and #b1 #yDexterity.

aigisMod:Fortress.NAME: Impenetrable Fortress
aigisMod:Fortress.FLAVOR: Louise: Even if there is no country, I will fight for the remaining people.
DESCRIPTIONS: Start the combat with #b2 #yDexterity. At the start of every turn increase the #ycost of a #yrandom card in your hand by #b1 for the turn.

aigisMod:RoyalHighness.NAME: Royal Highness
aigisMod:RoyalHighness.FLAVOR: Sybilla:If we created a kingdom, it would be splendid, don't you think?.
DESCRIPTIONS: Once per turn, when you draw or play a #yPrincess gain #b1 #yStrength and #b1 #yDexterity for the turn.

aigisMod:FidelityHarmony.NAME: Half-Moon's Awakening
aigisMod:FidelityHarmony.FLAVOR: Kaguya:It was just a political marriage, but ... I'm glad you were my husband.
DESCRIPTIONS: Add #b1 #yKaguya or #yHikage (if you have Kaguya) to your Deck. Each #b5 #yEastern #yCountry or #yShuriken cards you play gain [E] Reset counter on battle end.

aigisMod:HardFlame.NAME: Pill of Hard Flame
aigisMod:HardFlame.FLAVOR: Setsuna: One of the Oni-bashu, Setsuna, is here! What do you think?　Was it cool?
DESCRIPTIONS: #yShuriken Cards deal #b3 more damage. You can #yRight-Click this Relic to lose #b10 #yHP (Intangible won't reduce this damage) and add #b1 #ySetsuna to your #yhand. Usable once per combat.

aigisMod:HeroCrystal.NAME: Hero Crystal
aigisMod:HeroCrystal.FLAVOR: Solais: As a reward for conquering the tower's (Spire's) floors, I'll give you 'Hero Crystals.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b1 point for winning a combat.

While on the Map screen (outside of combat/event/campfire), if you have #b200 #yGold and #b5 points, #yRight-click this relic to add a #yUncommon #yHero Card. Adding a duplicate upgrades the card instead.
I can't use this right now...
Spend 200 gold and 5 points to add a Hero card to your deck.

aigisMod:DescendantHero.NAME: Descendant Of a Hero
DESCRIPTIONS: Draw an additional card at the start of combat. NL Every #b4 combats won, obtain a permanent effect, up to #b4 effects.
NL #y1. After first turn, draw an additional card each turn.
NL #y2. Start with an additional [E] each combat.
NL #y3. Double the first additional (1) effect.
NL #y4. Gain an [E] on your second turn.

aigisMod:EmpireHero.NAME: Hero of the Empire
aigisMod:EmpireHero.FLAVOR: A title bestowed to the strongest in the Empire.
DESCRIPTIONS: #yStrikes deal #yTrue #yDamage. Every #b5 combats won, obtain a permanent effect, up to #b3 effects.
NL #y1. #yStrikes and #yDefends gain #b2 Damage/Block.
NL #y2. When you play an Attack remove your #yWeak debuff.
NL #y3. When you play a Skill remove your #yVulnerable debuff.

aigisMod:ImperialTactics.NAME: Imperial Tactics
aigisMod:ImperialTactics.FLAVOR: The White Empire's number one strategist who is known as the Undefeated Mastermind.
DESCRIPTIONS: When you play #yLeona or #yLeora, gain [E]
NL When you play a #yDefend gain #b3 #yCounter.

aigisMod:ImperialKnight.NAME: Imperial Knight Escort
aigisMod:ImperialKnight.FLAVOR: I am known as Lux. I am a proud knight of the White Empire.
DESCRIPTIONS: Star each combat with #b1 #yImperial #yKnight #yLux in your hand.
NL When you draw an #yImperial #yKnight gain #b1 #yStrength for the turn.

aigisMod:DemonicTerritory.NAME: Demonic Territory
aigisMod:DemonicTerritory.FLAVOR: Lapis: I'll lend you my power...be thankful.
DESCRIPTIONS: For the first #b5 turns in a combat, gain #b1 Damage Aura.
NL At the end of your turn, if you played a #yDemon Power card, gain block equal to Damage Aura.

aigisMod:ImperialAgent.NAME: Imperial Dark Bureau
aigisMod:ImperialAgent.FLAVOR: Viktor: I was once known as the Empire’s most heinous criminal.
DESCRIPTIONS: When an enemy is #ydefeated, apply #b2 #yWeak and #b2 #yVulnerable to all enemies.

aigisMod:WhiteDragon.NAME: White Dragon's Preparations
aigisMod:WhiteDragon.FLAVOR: Sabein: No longer do such things as race or nationality divide us.
DESCRIPTIONS: #yThree times per combat: if you play an #yImperial and a #yDemon in the same turn gain [E]

aigisMod:ImperialSniper.NAME: Imperial Sniper
aigisMod:ImperialSniper.FLAVOR: Ralph became the leader of the sniper unit as a result of his prowess in rapid fire combat.
DESCRIPTIONS: During #yBoss or #yElite combats, if you defeat a enemy, gain [E] and #b2 #yStrength.

aigisMod:ImperialDeploy.NAME: Imperial Rapid Deployment
aigisMod:ImperialDeploy.FLAVOR: White Emperor: How many victories that can be obtained.
DESCRIPTIONS: If you used only #yImperial #ycards in a turn, gain [E] next turn.
NL Start each combat with an #yImperial #yAirship in your hand.

aigisMod:ImperialInfantry.NAME: Imperial Heavy Infantry
aigisMod:ImperialInfantry.FLAVOR: Dwight: My loyalty will not waver, so I will not remove this armor.
DESCRIPTIONS: #yDefends gain #b1 more Block.
NL Each time you play #b8 #yImperial cards you gain #b4 Block.

aigisMod:DemonCommand.NAME: Demon Chief's Command
aigisMod:DemonCommand.FLAVOR: Mephisto: It is barbaric to obtain everything with might. Allow me to test your intellect.
DESCRIPTIONS: Once per combat you can #yRight #yClick this relic to #yExhaust #b1 card in your hand.
NL If you exhaust a #yDemon with this relic gain #b1 #yStrength.

aigisMod:AdamasChosen.NAME: Chosen of Adamas
aigisMod:AdamasChosen.FLAVOR: White Emperor: It's not just my honor and status, but also precious people, beloved ones, that must be protected.
DESCRIPTIONS: #yStrikes and #yDefends become cost #b0.

aigisMod:MagnumOpus.NAME: Magnum Opus
aigisMod:MagnumOpus.FLAVOR: Helmine: You see, I'm a certified alchemist of the White Empire.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b1 Potion slot. When you use a #yPotion, #yupgrade all #yCommon and #yUncommon cards in your hand during this #ycombat.

aigisMod:EmperorAwakening.NAME: Emperor Awakening
aigisMod:EmperorAwakening.FLAVOR: White Emperor: No, living within the Empire, is synonymous with continuing to win.
DESCRIPTIONS: Start each #yElite and #yBoss combat with #b3 #yStrength and #b3 #yDexterity.

aigisMod:DemonicRelease.NAME: Demonic Release
aigisMod:DemonicRelease.FLAVOR: Lily: Thank you for helping Lily who became a demon.
DESCRIPTIONS: The first #yStrike you play each turn deals double damage.
Once per turn: When you play a #yStrike or #yDefend you can #yExhaust #b1 #yDemon #ycard from #yDraw #yPile.

aigisMod:CallHelp.NAME: Call for Help
aigisMod:CallHelp.FLAVOR: Totono: Haa... I still don't have enough money.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of each combat. Add #b1 Ambushed Caravan to your Deck.

aigisMod:CursedBoundary.NAME: Cursed Boundary
aigisMod:CursedBoundary.FLAVOR: Katara:What I possess is merely a single piece of The Power of Destruction that has been passed down within my clan.
DESCRIPTIONS: If you have a #yCurse in your Deck when picking this relic, add #b1 #yKatara #yUpgraded.
Once per turn, press #yRight-click to discard #b1 #yCurse card in your hand to deal #b5 damage to all enemies.
I don't have any curses in my hand...

aigisMod:OldClergyman.NAME: Old Clergyman
aigisMod:OldClergyman.FLAVOR: Vincent:One day when I got home from work, I found that my wife and daughter had been attacked and bitten by vampires.
DESCRIPTIONS: Once per combat, press #yRight-click to exhaust #b1 card in your hand. If its an #yUndead character gain [E] equal to it's cost.

aigisMod:DeathCurse.NAME: Curse of death
aigisMod:DeathCurse.FLAVOR: Mitra: The ability known as a 'curse' is a double-edged sword that will shave away ones own life if it's not used correctly.
DESCRIPTIONS: While you have #b3 or more #yCurses in #yMaster #yDeck, at the end of your turn, defeat all enemies with #yWeak that have #b10% or less of their max HP.

aigisMod:TenguBlaze.NAME: Tengu's Blaze
aigisMod:TenguBlaze.FLAVOR: Guren: Show me the ideal end. I'll lend you my strength until then.
DESCRIPTIONS: Once per combat, you can #yright-click this relic to exhaust #b1 card in your hand, if it is a #yCurse or #yStatus, #ydraw #b1 card and all enemies gain #b3 Burn.

aigisMod:CatDisturbance.NAME: Cat's Disturbance
aigisMod:CatDisturbance.FLAVOR: Koharu: Instilling fear in people is quite boorish. I confer passion.
DESCRIPTIONS: All enemies start each combat with #b1 less #yStrength. On the #b6th turn, all enemies lose #b1 Strength.

aigisMod:ScrambleGolem.NAME: Scramble Golem
aigisMod:ScrambleGolem.FLAVOR: Rilke: What, you want me to read your fortune?
DESCRIPTIONS: Once per combat, you can #yright-click this relic to exhaust #b1 Card in your hand, if it is a #yGolem #yFragment, gain #b3 Metallicize.

aigisMod:GolemBoost.NAME: Golem Boost
aigisMod:GolemBoost.FLAVOR: Anri: I grant power to lifeless objects. Please make good use of the essence of enchantment.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, add to hand 1 #yGolem #yFragment+. When a Golem Fragment is created, #yupgrade it.

aigisMod:WorldTree.NAME: World Tree Guard
aigisMod:WorldTree.FLAVOR: Rovinia: Are you okay? Are you sleeping well?
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start each of combat, gain #b8 Ranger Trap. #yArchers deal #b1 additional damage while you have #yRanger #yTrap.

aigisMod:WoundReturning.NAME: Wound-Returning Spell
aigisMod:WoundReturning.FLAVOR: Mikoto: Would you allow me to cast misfortunes off of you?
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, add to hand #b1 #yShikioni. #yShikioni gains #b3 additional Block.

aigisMod:SerpentPoison.NAME: Serpent's Curse Poison
aigisMod:SerpentPoison.FLAVOR: Orochihime: It could be a poison, or a medicine. Fufufu, I wonder which is which?
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, apply #b2 #yCursed #yVoice to all enemies. When an enemy attacks, it gains #b1 Poison.

aigisMod:Ifrit.NAME: Summoned Ifrit
aigisMod:Ifrit.FLAVOR: Solano: Come, I Summon the Beast of flame, Ifrit!
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, apply #b6 #yBurn to all enemies.

aigisMod:UndeadWorld.NAME: Last Death Energy
aigisMod:UndeadWorld.FLAVOR: Metus: Human bodies sure are inconvenient. I suppose this is what it means to be alive.
DESCRIPTIONS: Start each combat with #b3 Skeleton Unit and #b1 Metus in Exhaust Pile.
Once per combat, if you have #b30% of HP or less, you can #yRight-click this relic, add #b1 Undead from Exhaust Pile to hand.

aigisMod:Daywalker.NAME: Daywalker
aigisMod:Daywalker.FLAVOR: Eden: My memories before I became a vampire? I don't remember...
DESCRIPTIONS: #yVampire #yBite is reduced by #b3 instead.
When you attack an enemy with #yVampire #yBite, gain #b1 #yTemporary #yHP.

aigisMod:BastetGem.NAME: Bastet Gem
aigisMod:BastetGem.FLAVOR: Saval: The 'Cursed Gem', in return for granting the bearer immense power, they'll continue to devour their soul.
DESCRIPTIONS: The first #b3 times in a combat you #yexhaust a #yCurse, gain #b1 #yStrength.

aigisMod:ArmoredDecius.NAME: Armored Decius
aigisMod:ArmoredDecius.FLAVOR: Meteor: Decius is a despicable man who has no scruples about what he does in order to win!
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of the first #b4 turns, gain #b5 #yBlock.
Once per Act, if your HP becomes #b0 in combat gain #b25 HP.

aigisMod:MaouDecius.NAME: Maou Mecha Decius
aigisMod:MaouDecius.FLAVOR: Decius: Aah, I can hear the voice of the stars. What a beautiful tone...
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces Armored Decius. Add a Maou Mecha Form to your Deck.
Once per Act, if your HP becomes #b0 in combat gain #b35 HP.

aigisMod:MeteorSword.NAME: Meteor Sword Technique
aigisMod:MeteorSword.FLAVOR: Decius: This is the Special Technique...!? To be able to drop meteors is t-too unfair....
DESCRIPTIONS: Channel #b1 #yMeteor with #b6 damage at the start of each combat.
When a card #ychannels a #yMeteor, it is created with #b1 more damage.

aigisMod:KnightProtection.NAME: Holy Knight's Protection
aigisMod:KnightProtection.FLAVOR: Cornelia: Even if this is the power of the demons, what I must accomplish remains the same.
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time you play an Attack each turn, gain #b3 #yBlock.
The first time you play a #yDark #yFighter in combat gain #b1 #yBuffer.

aigisMod:ShieldBless.NAME: Shield Bless
aigisMod:ShieldBless.FLAVOR: Heios: Even a sword fallen into darkness can protect its brilliance.
DESCRIPTIONS: When you play a #yDark #yFighter gain #b1 #yThorns.
While your #yHP is at #b50% or less, gain #b2 #yDexterity.

aigisMod:SuperMeteor.NAME: Super Meteor Tactics
aigisMod:SuperMeteor.FLAVOR: Aisha: What, I don't look like a tactician to you?
DESCRIPTIONS: Once per turn, when you play a #yMeteor card gain [E]

aigisMod:BlastingEnhancement.NAME: Secret Art of Blasting Enhancement
aigisMod:BlastingEnhancement.FLAVOR: Garania: Mastering the spirit of magic, that's my mission.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, #yChannel #b1 #yMeteor if there is more than #b1 enemy.
When an enemy appears in combat, #yChannel #b1 #yMeteor.

aigisMod:BlastingBall.NAME: Super Human Blasting Ball
aigisMod:BlastingBall.FLAVOR: Dina: I wonder if it's because of my armor... My muscles are all worn out.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, deal #b10 damage to all enemies if you have #b16 or more #yBlock

aigisMod:SealRelease.NAME: Divine Seal Release
aigisMod:SealRelease.FLAVOR: Chloe: Even fallen angels have something to defend.
DESCRIPTIONS: Start each combat with #b2 #yBlur.

aigisMod:IndomitableTraitor.NAME: Indomitable Traitor
aigisMod:IndomitableTraitor.FLAVOR: Shadia: You humans, thousands of years pass and you remain as foolish as ever.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of player's turn #b5, if you have not received #yHP damage, deal #b50 damage to all enemies.

aigisMod:HolyAura.NAME: Holy Aura
aigisMod:HolyAura.FLAVOR: Yurina: I can't believe that I still have human feelings...
DESCRIPTIONS: #yDark #yFighter cards are retained.
At the end of your #b4th turn, gain #b10 #yBlock.

aigisMod:HotSands.NAME: Hot Sand Tactics
aigisMod:HotSands.FLAVOR: Nephty: Leave it to us to guide you through the desert. Come on, let's go with the wind.
DESCRIPTIONS: When you attack an #yElite or #yBoss enemy, gain #b2 Block.

aigisMod:Endurance.NAME: Endurance Up
aigisMod:Endurance.FLAVOR: Dan: Reaching beyond my limits is my reason for living!
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b2 #yTemporal #yHP when you play a card that was created in combat.
Usable up to #b5 times per turn.

aigisMod:Miracle.NAME: Miracle Man
aigisMod:Miracle.FLAVOR: Goddess Aigis: Don't give up, humans. For now, I, Goddess Aigis, will lend you my power.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b3 #yTemporal #yHP when you play a card that was created in combat.
Usable up to #b5 times per turn.

aigisMod:DepthTorpedo.NAME: Depth Torpedo
aigisMod:DepthTorpedo.FLAVOR: Wirbel: I wish I could dive into people's minds and solve everything.
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time in a combat you lose HP while you have #yWater #yPressure, all enemies lose #b2 #yStrength.

aigisMod:SharkTide.NAME: Shark Tide
aigisMod:SharkTide.FLAVOR: Fine: I came from an underwater city. I'll do my best to study the dry land!
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of turn if you have #b2 or more #yWater #yPressure.

aigisMod:AerialFight.NAME: Rampage Takeoff
aigisMod:AerialFight.FLAVOR: Krehl: I'm Krehl, the Security Forces Flight Commander. Um, can I go now?
DESCRIPTIONS: Draw #b1 card when you draw an #yAir #ySignal. Usable #yTwice per turn and while you have cards in your #ydraw #ypile.

aigisMod:CaitSith.NAME: Cait Sith
aigisMod:CaitSith.FLAVOR: Farne: I'm reading right now. ...Don't interrupt me.
DESCRIPTIONS: Every #b10th #ycard #ycreated in a single combat (except in exhaust pile), add #b1 #yCait #ySith to your #yhand.

aigisMod:PumpUp.NAME: Pump Up
aigisMod:PumpUp.FLAVOR: Gina: Men are so one-dimensional, eh?
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your #b3rd turn, gain #b3 #yVigor, #b3 #yTemporal #yHP and #yHeal #b3 #yHP.

aigisMod:AutoHeal.NAME: Auto Heal
aigisMod:AutoHeal.FLAVOR: Ur: With these claws, I can even defeat demons!
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, deal #b1 #ydamage to ALL #yenemies.
At the end of your turn, gain #b1 #yTemporal #yHP.

aigisMod:PearlGrace.NAME: Pearls' Grace
aigisMod:PearlGrace.FLAVOR: Ritva: There are many strong warriors in the deep sea. I must learn from them...!
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of the combat, apply #b1 #yWater #yPressure to ALL #yenemies.
Whenever you play #yDeep #bSea, deal #b3 #ydamage to a #yrandom #yenemy.

aigisMod:FiringCommand.NAME: Firing Command
aigisMod:FiringCommand.FLAVOR: Reanbell: As long as I am with you, any disadvantage turns into an advantage.
DESCRIPTIONS: #ySailor cards apply their full effects even if #yWater #yPressure is not reduced.

aigisMod:VitalityMedicine.NAME: Secret Medicine of Vitality
aigisMod:VitalityMedicine.FLAVOR: Nicole: First of all, let's convert this place into an atelier. Assistant, can you bring my luggage?
DESCRIPTIONS: #yCancel any #yDamage coming from yourself during the #yfirst #b2 #yturns of each combat.
Gain #b1 #yPotion #ySlot.

aigisMod:AigisStatue.NAME: Aigis Statue
aigisMod:AigisStatue.FLAVOR: Anna: But you can draw out her summon ability.
DESCRIPTIONS: Create a number of #yAigis #yStatue at the start of combat. Increase this amount by #b2 at the end of combat.

aigisMod:AigisShrine.NAME: Aigis Shrine
aigisMod:AigisShrine.FLAVOR: The people built a large, solitary shrine for their hero, a shrine to deify the goddess Aigis.
DESCRIPTIONS: Receive an extra #ycard #yreward on normal and elite combats, which contains up to #b3 cards from the other #yAigis characters.

aigisMod:AigisShrineEmperor.NAME: Aigis Shrine
aigisMod:AigisShrineEmperor.FLAVOR: The people built a large, solitary shrine for their hero, a shrine to deify the goddess Aigis.
DESCRIPTIONS: Receive an extra #ycard #yreward on normal and elite combats, which contains up to #b3 cards from the other #yAigis characters.

aigisMod:AigisShrineAvenger.NAME: Aigis Shrine
aigisMod:AigisShrineAvenger.FLAVOR: The people built a large, solitary shrine for their hero, a shrine to deify the goddess Aigis.
DESCRIPTIONS: Receive an extra #ycard #yreward on normal and elite combats, which contains up to #b3 cards from the other #yAigis characters.

aigisMod:AigisShrineKnight.NAME: Aigis Shrine
aigisMod:AigisShrineKnight.FLAVOR: The people built a large, solitary shrine for their hero, a shrine to deify the goddess Aigis.
DESCRIPTIONS: Receive an extra #ycard #yreward on normal and elite combats, which contains up to #b3 cards from the other #yAigis characters.

aigisMod:AigisShrineMiracle.NAME: Aigis Shrine
aigisMod:AigisShrineMiracle.FLAVOR: The people built a large, solitary shrine for their hero, a shrine to deify the goddess Aigis.
DESCRIPTIONS: Receive an extra #ycard #yreward on normal and elite combats, which contains up to #b3 cards from the other #yAigis characters.
